lender.name: Kole & Chayce

lender.name: David

lender.name: Shari, Denis and Barney

lender.name: Christine

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I study languages and psychology in a university. I want to become a professor some day.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can, and if you can, you should.

lender.name: lonn
lender.loan_because: I live on this planet
lender.occupational_info: I help startup high technology companies grow into big technology companies

lender.name: Madhukar
lender.loan_because: Nolan Bushnell said - "The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It's as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer." Being a dreamer I am still in that phase where I have to get off my butt, I want to help those who are the doers and inspire them and myself by doing so.
lender.occupational_info: I presently look after product management of electrical products, as a part of strategic marketing group of Electrical & Electronics Business division of an Indian multinational.

lender.name: AFSers from Michigan
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better, more peaceful place!

lender.name: knr

lender.name: Amanda Lynn

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and a great way to make a difference.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: my AP Human Geography teacher inspired to lend a hand to those in need. She has shown me that even one person can change the lives of many.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student who wants to create something that will make people's lives better and happier.

lender.name: Farbod
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help people effectively.

lender.name: Sadiq Siddiqui

lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I am dreaming of a better future.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves instills pride as well as alleviating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I love foreign cultures--I used to be a Spanish and ESL (English as a Second Language) teacher before my daughter was born, now I stay home to take care of her. I still work in a high school part -time coaching an academic extra-curricular team.

lender.name: Alisha
lender.loan_because: with opportunities like these people are able to do amazing things in the world and money should not be what holds them back.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: We can, we should, we MUST, so we shall!
lender.occupational_info: Entertainment is my business!

lender.name: eric
lender.loan_because:
It encourages financial independence through entrepreneurship. As pointed by another lender, Kiva is not just another charity. On top of the money, it delivers development planning, organizational and financial advices and best of all it gives dignity to the borrowers who can say at the end: I DID IT.
On the personal side, it's good to think you did something useful...without that much of an effort. Congratulations to the Kiva teams for this excellent initiative.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps people to help themselves and grow their busnesses thereby gaining self respect

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredit.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: Where else can $25 do so much for another human being?
lender.occupational_info: I have fun with numbers and excel.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I can. And because it's more productive than buying glow in the dark alarm clocks and fish shaped door handles from ebay.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in a small way to give them the opportunity to help themselves to make a better life.

lender.name: Hitoshi
lender.loan_because: I wishing that World people find happiness

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate that I can give to people who are in need. These loans can make a difference to their family lives.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: it seems like a good idea and would love to be able to help some one achieve a better quality of life doing what they are good at.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital setting up the computers. I try to set up systems as best I can. I have a lot of freedom and choice at work to do what I want and expensive toys to play with. I work with interesting people and enjoy my job

lender.name: Harbor Springs Econ
lender.loan_because: For an economics class project, students created their own class business; the profit earned from the businesses support entrepreneurs around the world in an effort to aid in the fight against poverty.

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: We got 50 dollars as a Kiva gift on our 70th birthday

lender.name: Charles

lender.loan_because: I want to help improve people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and adults how to play the violin and piano. I work from my home.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am a widow who raised 3 sons. I understand life can be difficult.
lender.occupational_info: I sell flowers for people to give on special occasions.

lender.name: Bethaney
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to contribute to wider society. I particularly feel for Cambodia because I've seen first hand what lovely, warm people live there and how much they need.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because:
I believe in giving a hand up as we are all in this together.
My inspiration is the song "We Are the World" and we are!
lender.occupational_info:
I am 100% entrepreneur.
I've created many business' in my life time. I love to help people who want to bring their dreams to life.
I know what it's like not to have money and at the same time have a dream in my heart, all I needed was some financial help to support my dream.
Now I am so happy to help others build their dreams.

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I believe in loans CAN change lives!

lender.name: sharron
lender.occupation: Retired. Former VP at American Express.
lender.loan_because: there is no such thing as having "done enough already"

lender.name: bob
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: retiredI

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I am more than willing to help those who want to help themsevs
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Boston and currently work at a power plant in Lowell, MA.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I want to empower responsible business owners in less fortunate countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney, practicing in the areas of civil litigation, real estate, workers' compensation and municipal court.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people to help themselves in an unbureaucratic way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher at a German high school for children from the age of eleven to 19 years. I teach English, French and "ethics / moral" (having to do with philosophy, psychology and questions that concern our way of life).

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that I CAN make a difference in the lives of others. I am not just giving away money and hoping that it helps someone, but I am providing an opportunity to someone who is willing to invest time and effort to turn my money into something worthwhile, and then returning it to me so it can help someone else! What a great idea!!!
lender.occupational_info: In my full-time profession, I help small companies here in the US grow their business by investing my time and expertise in helping them develop effective sales channels, and I am compensated with a small percentage of the profits they make as a direct result.

lender.name: Kathy Allen
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people to do their best and that as much of our donations should go directly to the cause.
lender.occupational_info: My company help charities and 'good cause' organisations raise their profile and money through marketing and PR campaigns.

lender.name: The Davis Family
lender.loan_because: There is an abundance in the world. We see that others need it more than we do, and we want to help them get what they want.

lender.name: christina
lender.occupation: retail + event manager for a non-profit
lender.loan_because: The thought of being able to help people change their lives makes me shiver.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage a retail store that supports a non-profit writing lab. 826LA is a non-profit organization dedicated to supporting students ages 6 to 18 with their creative and expository writing skills, and to helping teachers inspire their students to write.
Our services are structured around our belief that great leaps in learning can happen with one-on-one attention, and that strong writing skills are fundamental to future success.
With this in mind, we provide drop-in tutoring, after-school workshops, in-schools tutoring, help for English language learners, and assistance with student publications.
All of our programs are challenging and enjoyable, and ultimately strengthen each students power to express ideas effectively, creatively, confidently, and in his or her individual voice.

lender.name: Harish & Shireesha
lender.loan_because: its my small way of making this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software programs.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women become financially independent.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Manule
lender.loan_because: I believe in solidarity and generosity. I have three children and I care about humanity. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am travelling with my three children for six months in Australia. This huge country is very different from my tiny home country.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of commerce to improve lives.

lender.name: Sparkey
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give

lender.name: MNP - PSG
lender.loan_because: Our mom's would be proud

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think people all over the world are doing amazing things and sometimes you just need a few extra funds to meet your goals.

lender.name: David

lender.occupational_info: i have a cyber cafe and a computer training school

lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Sylvia

lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: KRIS
lender.loan_because: I am in a very fortunate position in my life at 45 yrs old, married for 1 year with a 13 yr old son, I can afford to loan monies to deserving entrepreneurs, I used to be one myself many years ago.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an investment company looking after around 12 offices on a flexible basis. I also have a travel design company, arranging unusual special interest travel throughout the world.

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful that Kiva exists to connect people worldwide and allow me to participate in helping others as I have been helped.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I like to give people encouragement and the resources to succeed in their lives.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much!
lender.occupational_info: I watch our three children, clean our house, and cook.

lender.name: Jean-Marie
lender.loan_because: J'aime me sentir utile.
lender.occupational_info: J'enseigne les sciences des jeunes de 18 20 ans.

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: It's not about me, it's about us......

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and know that a small amount of capital can make a big difference in growing a business. I believe that energy you put out comes back to you.
lender.occupational_info: I sell incense supplies and children's clothing on the Internet and in craft shows.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help people. Somebody once told me that you won't get anywhere in life if you don't help other people get where they want in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to be a doctor and one day would like to help other countries who need medical help.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I was very fortunate to learn at a young age that true fulfillment does not come from what you have or what you accumulate but instead it comes from what you give back and contribute to the world that has put us where we are. Too often we hurry and rush to get somewhere only to realize we never actually 'get there'. If we always tell our selves we will give back once we 'get there' then it will be too late.
lender.occupational_info:
I search out ways to teach, help and improve people. This is through reading, writing, speaking and mentoring, among other things. Often the most can be taught and learned through genuine friendship.
I also seek out the best and most productive businesses in which to invest money so that money can grow to allow me to further contribute.

lender.name: Ivette
lender.loan_because: I want to share the wealth and support women around the world. I usually sponser single women with children in Spanish speaking countries.

lender.name: Arlen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who work hard and want to run their own business.
lender.occupational_info: The company I own uses computer controlled machines called WEDM (wire electric discharge machines) to precisely make or modify metal components from raw material stock, such as round bars, square and rectangular bars, sheet and plate.

lender.name: Ruthe
lender.loan_because: it's our human connection with other people on planet earth. We share the world and this is right sharing of resources.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to someone's story and health concerns and match their symptoms to an energetic remedy made from a plant, animal or mineral.

lender.name: Lyn

lender.occupational_info: I work for my self as a tax and business services accountant.

lender.loan_because: We can make a real difference.

lender.name: Vital Imagery Ltd.
lender.loan_because: Since we started our business in 2006 we have been looking for a way to 'give back'. We found this organization and thought this would be the perfect way to help make a difference. :)
lender.occupational_info: Our company offers online access to clipart, photos, etc. by subscription. We are donating 10c from every subscription we sell to this program.

lender.name: MATT & WENDY
lender.loan_because: WE WANT OTHERS TO GROW AS OUR NEW MARRIAGE GROWS.

lender.name: Eric T.
lender.loan_because: I want to help others with their endeavours and make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: angela
lender.loan_because: I was given a kiva gift certificate as a gift. I loan because it is a good feeling to help others.

lender.name: Scott Paterson
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be successfully self-employed myself and am happy to be able to support others in the larger world in that endeavor too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the webmaster for http://Saabnet.com, a resource for Saab car owners that I created on the Internet in 1988. I'm also the founder of the non-profit organization called http://Poverty2Prosperity.org Please join me on Lending Team P2P! http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity

lender.name: The Osborne Family
lender.loan_because: this is a win - win situation. My family and I want to make a positive change in our world, and we believe this is just the beginning. This is the system of pay-it-forward and while we help one person they continue to help themselves and others.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to take charge of their lives and make changes for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the little ones how to read and try to show them what an amazing world this place is.

lender.occupational_info: I make machines talk, sing and sound.

lender.name: Bill Luton

lender.occupational_info: I teach college students in several universities, from the undergraduate level to MBA level.

lender.occupational_info: I'm into beads making, I also trained entrepreneurs on how to make beads of difference styles and design.

lender.name: Jose Vicente
lender.loan_because: I loan because I'm thankful for my life and wish to spread it to someone who might be less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I'm some one who helps to develop our material world.

lender.name: Ines

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I have been given several opportunities in my life from others to promote my own health and well-being. I know without these gracious people who have touched my life, I would not be where I am today. I just want to give back what was so freely given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a graduate student.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: I can. I have more than I need and so many opportunities. I want to share that with others and help them create their own opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students a second language, an empathy for others around the world, and as much cultural understanding as anyone can gain without traveling abroad.

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to help people all over the world make their (business) dream come true by giving them the only thing which is missing - money.

lender.name: Ziad Iskandar
lender.loan_because: The idea of empowering people to help themselves is effective and brings out the best in people.

lender.name: robert luciano
lender.loan_because: As a kid growing up I expience poverty and hunger first hand and I consider myself fortunate to have been able to move forward.
lender.occupational_info: As a graphic designer I design advertising and promotional materials, poster, displays etc. that help my clients sell their products.

lender.name: Paul
lender.whereabouts: San Pedro Garza Garcia Nuevo Leon
lender.loan_because: I think those of us that have been blessed by our Lord have a moral obligation to help other less fortunate. I chose Kiva because it provides a way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the most precious resource any country can have, its children. With a proper education a people can raise their standard of living almost without limit, Im glad I can help my country in such a way.

lender.name: Judi & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We want to feel connected to the world.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: When I had little more than a good idea and a plan, others loaned to me. By loaning to those in need, I am honoring those who loaned to me.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build the systems that your ISP uses to provide you with internet access.

lender.name: Guenther
lender.loan_because: These microcredits are a good way to help others to help themselves. I believe the direct way is the most effctive one.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a heart clinic together with colleagues from all over the world.

lender.name: Boja
lender.loan_because: ... to share with less fortunate

lender.name: Los Gatos Kiva Fund
lender.loan_because: We loan becasue we believe in this project.
lender.occupational_info: We are all form different work and educational backgrounds.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: it's important to help where you can...

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kathy in California
lender.occupational_info: I play Irish/Scottish folk music around the world.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: "Credit: Mans Confidence in Man" ~ John Moody

lender.name: KIVA HS Osnabrueck
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves to be self sufficient
lender.occupational_info:
We would like to show friends of ours, how easy it is to support entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially those from under developed countries. We ask our friends and fellow students for a donation of one cent or a small donation of less than 1 Euro, which we collect and transfer it to our Kiva account.
The HS-Osnabrueck Students

lender.name: Too Cool Girlies
lender.loan_because: It helps people and we like that!
lender.occupational_info: We are students and we do chores around our house to earn money to lend to others and buy ice cream!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have to do something personal to help alleviate suffering in the world. The ability to have a direct relationship with the recipients allows me to know people in very different cultures from my own and makes it harder to thin of anyone as "them."
lender.occupational_info: In addition to maintaining a private psychology practice I teach workshops on yoga, meditation and spiritual practice in many different countries.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: non-profit sports organization

lender.name: Dawn & Tim
lender.loan_because: We love that we can help those that are not in the fortunate position that we are here in the West, but deserve to have the same opportunities and power over their own destiny and lives.
lender.occupational_info: We help people to find and know their BLISS in this life.

lender.name: Mahdi Y. R, Ghoush
lender.loan_because: Allah Ordered us as displayed in (Al Quran AL Kareem) in our religion (AL Islam) to help each others -
lender.occupational_info: i'am 42 y old from jordan,i have 2 childrens ,i own my computer trading est., not rich & not poor i'am convinced in my life style, Regards

lender.name: Dumdum
lender.loan_because: It is interesting to see people in a very different country doing similar businesses but in a vastly different setting.
lender.occupational_info: Wine and cheese, coffee and chocolate... life is good!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to show compassion and to make a concrete difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach a variety of courses in communication and film.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference on a global level rather than just a local one - plus it's very addictive!!!
lender.occupational_info: I arrange home loans to help people buy property

lender.name: OBrien Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe that those who can help have an ethical obligation to do so. If we can give, we must give.
lender.occupational_info: He is a teacher and middle school principal and she is a social worker. Both are pursuing MSWs from Penn. We are proud parents of two fourth graders who help us pick our entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: I live in a very lucky country and have everything and more and these people have so little...wanting to share in some small way
lender.occupational_info: I live and work in a holiday resort.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: we are teaching our children about helping others, and how even a small amount of money can make an impact in people's lives.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: "it's better to teach someone to fish - than to give them a fish", so assisting people to kick-start their lives is a great idea.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I believe microlending is the best way to alleviate global poverty and I am eager to see firsthand the impact a small loan can make on the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to graduate school for international affairs and would like to work in microfinance afterwards.

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed to have my family and friends and to live in America. If I can help even one person in a small way by donating then maybe it can lead to others who in turn may help someone else because of the chance they were given.

lender.name: Matt Vogele
lender.loan_because: To Give Hope. Help People Everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Cadet in the U.S. Army ROTC program.

lender.name: Tia
lender.loan_because: a small loan can make a big difference in a person's life

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the opportunity of giving people a hand up, so they can provide for themselves and family

lender.name: 7 Friends
lender.loan_because: we can, and want to. There is a saying that goes something like, "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he never goes hungry". We believe it's all about empowering people, and maintaing one's dignity. If our contributions can help then it is our pleasure and joy to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We are 7 friends who have known each other for many years, we should be ever mindful of our good fortune, give thanks for all we have and give back to help others achieve their best potential.

lender.name: Yukihiro
lender.loan_because:
One day ,I watch TV and I knew Kiva. Kiva is great idea!
this is My wife`s website.my wife is flutist. (I have no website and I make this website.)

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: i am interested in the work and lifestyle of others who are less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: i am fortunate to simply have to go to school every day

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: God has been very generous to me; it's my turn to be generous to others.

lender.name: Rowena
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: My work is creative and finance based.

lender.name: Chayut
lender.loan_because:
I still progressing on operating system.It just begun and need fund to support at the starter step and evaluation for potential of this sketch project in thailand first.
It's hard to start some plantform outside silicon valley or USA,so to go on and continue for sketch project which may go further to silicon valley in the future raise a fund is the basic step.
lender.occupational_info: New operating system that may impact though web 2.0 and 3.0.The details are top classified due to idea copyright and piracy.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: others have helped me along the way and I'd like to pay it forward.

lender.name: stefan
lender.loan_because: I think it is a easy and good idea. Let's have a look who it works.

lender.name: Annika
lender.loan_because: It encourages change, and I would want someone to do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an aspiring clothing designer, and student, and i am so proud to be helping yoI.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people accomplish their goals and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an American English teacher in South Korea. Being immersed in a foreign culture has been a challenging and rewarding experience.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: i wanna help others lead a more comfortable lifestyle. I also want to lessen poverty one loan at a time, which is a great way because it paves way for economic stability and independence in locations where consumer profits are weak.
lender.occupational_info: As of now Im still in school, i go to class everyday. But i would like to have job that makes others feel better or lead better lives. I wanna force change, and introduce better lives for the less fortunate.

lender.name: Fundao BiMarketing
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of entrepreneurial Marketing students in Portugal.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: it really helps people to earn their own living!

lender.name: yoko
lender.loan_because: i like the idea of microfinance. It's a nice way of helping people in need.

lender.name: Sansao
lender.loan_because: I aim to create and further to implement a micro community development and sustainable project in the field food donation in other to alleviate hunger amongst the street kids here in my town. In addition, i would like to make a project network in other to implement an income generation project amongst the single mothers within the rural areas in my city.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very interesting and so important, as i usually work with young people as well in the communities around Maputo city, in other to involve them in work volunteer programs and also doing some capacity building training and workshops around HIV/AIDS amongst young people.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Dorothea
lender.loan_because: I would like to help a little bit other people, who are in a less fortune situation, to realize their dreams of a wealthy and lucky life.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: DC James
lender.loan_because: "When you give to the poor you lend to God".
lender.occupational_info: "I inspire individuals to Leap Forward"

lender.name: Lacey
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Geologist in mining, currently working on a copper mine in the Democratic Republic of the Congo

lender.name: Jeanie
lender.loan_because: "Giving back" is important. I would not be where I am today without the help of others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a couple of small businesses. One is website design and the other is hosting telephone dictation service.

lender.name: Kristin (& Joe) Walker
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others and making a difference not only in my own community, but in the world we all share.
lender.occupational_info: I am also an entrepreneur, working in the network marketing (direct sales) industry. I work with the Stallone family and other wonderful people in a brand new company called Seriesse. It's exciting, rewarding and the best thing that has ever happened to us!

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I believe microcredit can really make a difference to alleviate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work backstage on operas.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get help when its needed.
lender.occupational_info: I expand the opportunities of local producers by doing research that in effect bears the brunt of the costs involved with adapting niche market crops to the surrounding area.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I want to help and know that my help is being received. I wish all the success to the many entrepreneurs across the world!

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: it's very important to me to empower women and to encourage argricultural endeavours.
lender.occupational_info: I create an information link by using communications tools (newsletters, articles, media kits, promotional activities, fact sheets, etc.) to bridge the gap between rural and urban, farmer and non-farmer.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has a gift and given the chance, they will flourish. I have been so blessed in my life and I want to share that abundance.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to do their job to the best of their ability. I help them use the computer and telephone to help other people enjoy their new toys.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to help big, in a world where we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides online documentation and communication tools for agencies that serve people with Developmental Disabilities. I help with training and supporting people that use our services.
